subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Receiver Brandon Lloyd has been released by the Washington Redskins, ending a disappointing tenure. Lloyd caught 25 passes with no touchdowns in two seasons with the Redskins, who traded two draft picks to the San Francisco 49ers to acquire him before the 2006 season.
